reviews.review_msg: Isabel is an incredible teacher, and she clearly adores her recurring students. She & Carolina Lemay have cultivated the best class environments I've ever been in. The structure of her classes is straightforward and effective, and it's obvious in everything she does that she wants her students to thrive.

She's a good prof but went on a tangent twice about how people should be thankful for the Mexico we have today & Spain gave them the culture and language we have now? Which isn't rlly wrong but ignores the entire destruction of Indigenous communities and their deaths?? Idk some underlying racist tones were coming thru and it's unfortunate.

ISABEL ES LA MEJOR!!!!! seriously though, she has helped me improve my spanish more than i ever thought was possible. she is so caring, funny, and really enjoys teaching her language-- it shows! its not an easy class but if you work hard she makes it possible to estn a high grade.
